content.question: Ideas in the excerpt would most likely have influenced which of the following?

choices.label: Arguments supporting defining slavery on the grounds of statesâ€™ rights
Claims that the United States should occupy all Mexican territory
Attempts to convince plantation owners to stop farming cash crops
Efforts at assisting enslaved people in escaping from the South

content.answer: Efforts at assisting enslaved people in escaping from the South

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
